/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrUserPwHDao.selectOrUserPwH */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD, DATE_FORMAT(T.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.PW_ENC,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM OR_USER_PW_H T
AND T.ODUR_UID = #{odurUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.PW_TYP_CD = #{pwTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MOD_DT = STR_TO_DATE(#{modDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD, T.MOD_DT
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
